name: Arnold Duffenberg
bio: Im an actor, acting is my dream but I also work at the dollar store because I dont get any roles and I'd be broke without it.

messages.message: I got offered a raise at my job and I could be making like 60 thousand dollars a year if i take it, but I also got a role for a movie that could make me way more!! What should I do?

ai_replies.full: You should take the acting job, since your dream is acting. Dont be afriad to take risks and follow your dreams!
Just take the promotion. Dont wanna take any risks, if you take the acting job you're probably going to fail, so just dont do it.

goto.message: Awesome sauce! I always wanted this oppurtunity, Thanks a lot Rex!
